=Introduction=

PRTG can be extended writing Custom Sensors (executables, WMI scripts, powershell scripts, etc.) On this page you can find Custom Sensors for *PRTG version 8 or later*.

_For PRTG version 7 take a look at [http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/wiki/CustomSensors this] page_.


Currently available sensors from:

 * [PTF_Custom_Sensors PRTG Tools Family]
